twdxL1cxm4NezP-ff.name: Contact Group (Reformed monsters, local coven, etc.)

m6DY-SVvG3R7z9EXA.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

tgRuZi7F1jBmF9nCv.name: Single-Minded
tgRuZi7F1jBmF9nCv.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

tlR1lgZVHptiinxyF.name: Luck
tlR1lgZVHptiinxyF.notes: Usable once per hour of play

mg5eSWFN-6KZsQdGy.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

tq8ptQxq2FRpcgajC.name: Combat Reflexes
tq8ptQxq2FRpcgajC.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

t5GMkP4Sb7T-sdzNg.name: Obsession
t5GMkP4Sb7T-sdzNg.notes: Learn a particular secret; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

teWoT3p26MD671F38.name: Post-Combat Shakes
teWoT3p26MD671F38.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

tIb95w418FmOax6wv.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
tIb95w418FmOax6wv.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)

tFBoWyPerT6Pd4wQ_.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
tFBoWyPerT6Pd4wQ_.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

features.situation: from others where conversation is required

tB3xkwDQQ2uuTNYoV.name: Severe Shyness
tB3xkwDQQ2uuTNYoV.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

tEs2uJjrBWnRr1Ill.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.
tEs2uJjrBWnRr1Ill.name: Mild Shyness

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

moRxVSKMmX0_fKKM1.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
moRxVSKMmX0_fKKM1.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

mcSitDlnEt-6uN67Y.name: Severe
mcSitDlnEt-6uN67Y.notes: Duration: 1d minutes; -5 on all skill rolls

mK5z0qXdSVEjy1HBj.name: Crippling
mK5z0qXdSVEjy1HBj.notes: Duration: 3d minutes; Precludes all skill use

mGKotxo7zJFBAJXaZ.notes: Duration: 2d seconds; -2 on all skill rolls
mGKotxo7zJFBAJXaZ.name: Mild

tjbqVJmRvXFfGbIcf.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he will roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you have a flashback. The GM will roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.
tjbqVJmRvXFfGbIcf.name: Flashbacks

tcFx41ka1iL0YnOF7.name: Callous

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy

tcFx41ka1iL0YnOF7.notes: +1 to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

t4aRMGbU5YtnAsLuY.name: Truthfulness
t4aRMGbU5YtnAsLuY.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must keep silent about an uncomfortable truth (lying by omission). Roll at -5 if you actually have to tell a falsehood! If you fail, you blurt out the truth, or stumble so much that your lie is obvious.

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

tsQSdTsO6FHvbAzlM.name: Overconfidence
tsQSdTsO6FHvbAzlM.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

t_3sjMUtzFuk4cwO7.notes: Make a self-control roll each morning upon awakening. If you fail, you suffered nightmares; this costs you 1 FP that you can only recover through sleep. On a roll of 17 or 18, you are left shaking, and are at -1 to all skill and Perception rolls for the entire day.
t_3sjMUtzFuk4cwO7.name: Nightmares

tufDHtVlUMJwICazG.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.
tufDHtVlUMJwICazG.name: Lecherousness

s8GNXePvZqd6l8xpH.name: Two points in another ranged weapon

sdsZ3ssMPCIuedqKB.name: 2 more points in Know Thy Enemy
